app.title: Asset Manager
app.description: Comprehensive asset management for ComfyUI - organize local assets, browse models, and manage outputs

tabs.localAssetsDescription: Manage and organize your local ComfyUI assets including models, checkpoints, and custom nodes
tabs.modelBrowserDescription: Browse and download models from CivitAI, HuggingFace, and other platforms
tabs.outputsDescription: View and manage your ComfyUI generated images and outputs

empty.title: No Models Found
empty.description: No models were found in the selected folder. Try selecting a different folder or check your ComfyUI model directories.

localAssets.placeholder: Local assets management functionality will be implemented here. You'll be able to organize models, checkpoints, and other assets.

modelBrowser.placeholder: Model browser functionality will be implemented here. Browse and download models from various platforms.

outputs.placeholder: Output management functionality will be implemented here. View and organize your generated images.

empty.title: No Models Found
empty.description: No models were found in the selected folder. Try selecting a different folder or check your ComfyUI model directories.
